note.p: Botanist and pharmacologist. Registered as a pharmaceutical chemist, 1862; chemist in Plymouth until 1871. Curator of the Pharmaceutical Society Museum, London, 1872–1922. Lecturer in botany at the Westminster Hospital School, 1873–6. Lecturer in materia medica at the Pharmaceutical Society, 1887–90. Studied lichens, marine algae, and mosses.
Mark Lawley, ‘Edward Morell Holmes’, http://rbg-web2.rbge.org.uk/bbs/Learning/Bryohistory/Bygone Bryologists/Edward Morell Holmes.rtf (accessed 31 August 2016)
